scenario_text.value: Oh my! Everyone, come here!
Are these... emergency food stores?!

Ohh, I get it. This sort of place would be
used as a disaster shelter, after all.

Thank goodness... We can make do with these
for the time being.

...Now hold on a minute. Are you sure this
stuff is edible?

Looking at the shape of the school, you’d
better check for an expiration date.

Umm...huh?
I don’t see one written anywhere.

What’d I tell ya?! I ain’t gonna put anything
that suspicious in my mouth!
Huh... I gotta say, it does sound iffy...
Even to a pig like you, Minoru?!
Hmm, now even I’m a bit worried...
Okay! Then that means it’s aaall mine!
*chomp*

Agumon!!!
What’re you—?!

*chew *chew*...
Mmm-MMM! Now that’s tasty!

Well sure, who knows what taste buds a
monster’s got...

When in Rome...
*chomp* *chomp*
Hang on! Minoru!
...Minoru?!

Hnnngh?!
Ugh, gaaah?!
(Minoru started squirming...!)
...HEY! ARE YOU OKAY?!
GAAAAAAUGH!!!
(Nnn...nnngh...)

(Minoru’s writhing around just to see if
we’ll react. He’s playing us for idiots.)
(How should I react?)
Knock it off.
Let me try, too!
Go along with it...
Stop fooling around, Minoru.

Whaddya mean, Takuma?
I’m really in pain right now!

I know you’ve been watching us for
a reaction.

Ugh...
This is the end...
Oh shut up already, Minoru.

Everything else might be fine.
I’m trying some, too.

What? Hang on, Takuma!
Stop that! Don’t!
*chomp*
You’re sneaky, Takuma!
Ugh...! This is awful!
Not you too, Takuma!
Takuma! Pull yourself together, Takuma!

(Aoi is on the brink of tears.
I’m feeling sorry for her...)
Minoru! Hang in there!
Takuma... I’m...done...for....
What? This isn’t the end!

You go home without me... Just make sure 
you...delete my browser history...!
Augh!
Minoru...! MINORUUU?!
What’re you two doing?

Psych!!!
Gotcha!

MINORU!!! I thought my heart was gonna
explode outta my CHEST!

YOU SONUVA—! There’s a time and a place for
joking around!
You idiot! Knock it off!
Now you just think about what you’ve done!

Heh heh...
Well, looks like the stuff passes!

We’ve found a lifeline of water and food for
now.

Still, we don’t know how long these supplies
will last, do we?

Between us and the little ones, I would say
half a year?

Half a year... Are you out of your mind?!
The past two days almost killed me!

Half a year is optimistic, man. We haven’t
seen any sign of rescue, you know.

...It pains me to say this, but I guess
you’re right.
Oh boy, human food is so tasty!
Oh yeah? Let me try some, too!

Hmm, well... I  cannot say I’m as intrigued as
you two, but...

I should at least check it for poison—
for Minoru’s sake, that is.

I’d say Minoru’s taken care of that for us
already!

Come on now, don’t spend the food
so carelessly!

Anyway, why don’t we search for other food,
just in case?

Yeah! And we’ll look for our own food too,
our own way!

Then the supplies will last you guys at least
a year!

A year... I can’t imagine staying here that
long.

We might end up burying each other here if
we’re unlucky.

I told you I didn’t want to hear that kind
of talk!
